headline: Inaugural Committee Spent Funds Improperly, Suit Says
abstract: The attorney general for the District of Columbia said in a civil suit that the president’s inaugural committee overpaid to rent space in the Trump hotel in Washington.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The attorney general for the District of Columbia filed suit on Wednesday against President Trump’s inaugural committee, accusing the organization of wasting hundreds of thousands of dollars in violation of a local law prohibiting self-dealing by nonprofit organizations.
